title: 113. Architecture as a Site of Thinking with Mark Dorrian
itunes:title: 113. Architecture as a Site of Thinking with Mark Dorrian
description: How might we think about architectural education differently in a post-pandemic world? What are the intersections between Covid and Climate Change? How does seeing architecture as a site of thinking impact education today? This week, we sit down with Mark Dorrian to take a deep dive into the material, political, cultural and educational realities surrounding the ongoing pandemic.
